rows.label: qev093002_MSG0010
rows.name: Right, then. First, take a look at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0020
rows.name:
The time we went to Oblivia...
Remember those mystery mechs that attacked us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0030
rows.name: I finally figured out what they're all about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0040
rows.name:
Rather, I remembered seeing the very same ones
in a database back on our home planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0050
rows.name: They're Qlurian? So that means...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0060
rows.name:
Yeah. Those machines are mobile weapons
developed using actual Qlurian technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0070
rows.name:
Ah, would it be easier if we simply
called them Skells?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0080
rows.name: Their model is old, practically antique,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0090
rows.name:
but these were special Skells who once served as
personal bodyguards to a certain Custodian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0100
rows.name:
They require no pilot, and were designed
from top to bottom to be fully autonomous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0110
rows.name:
In actual fact, there's something of a trick
to their autonomic functions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0120
rows.name:
Now, pop quiz: If I asked you who you could
trust implicitly, who comes to mind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_JNK0130
rows.name: Say Your Friends

rows.label: qev093002_SEL0140
rows.name:
Tell her that your friends will
always be there for you.

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0150
rows.name:
Indeed, a model answer. But in this case,
I'm sorry to say you'd be wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0160
rows.name: The answer is: yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0170
rows.name:
Why? Because logically,
it's impossible for you to betray yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_JNK0180
rows.name: Say Yourself

rows.label: qev093002_SEL0190
rows.name:
Tell her the only one you can
truly trust is numero uno.

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0200
rows.name: Hey, that's right! Gold star![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0210
rows.name:
Logically, the act of betraying
oneself doesn't hold up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0220
rows.name: Ergo, it stands that you can trust yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0230
rows.name: And so, the master of those Skells...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0240
rows.name:
copied her personality onto them,
and incorporated it into their autonomic system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0250
rows.name: The personality...of the High Custodian, Neilnail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_JNK0260
rows.name: Interrupt

rows.label: qev093002_SEL0270
rows.name:
Verify that she really said
"Neilnail's personality."

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0280
rows.name: I did. By which I mean of course—my predecessor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_JNK0290
rows.name: Wig Out

rows.label: qev093002_SEL0300
rows.name:
Conclude that by that logic,
Neil must be the attacker.

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0300
rows.name:
No, Lady Neil is referring to her predecessor,
the FORMER High Custodian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0310
rows.name:
The High Custodian...
Her existence is perpetuated through the use of clones.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0320
rows.name:
She who presides over the
knowledge of ancient times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0325
rows.name: Such is the destiny of Lady Neilnail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0330
rows.name:
Well, I may be a clone, but I still have my own
personality, thoughts and desires.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0340
rows.name:
The point is, those Skells are technically the
embodiment of a former iteration of Neilnail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0350
rows.name: Let's call the white one "Neilnail Albus"...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0360
rows.name: And the black one...can be "Neilnail Furvus."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0370
rows.name: Here's what I think:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0380
rows.name: Their job is to defend any sites of Qlurian influence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0390
rows.name: That is the duty of a Neilnail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0395
rows.name: And that's why we were attacked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0400
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0410
rows.name:
Who else to right the wrongs of the High Custodian...
but the High Custodian herself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0420
rows.name: Which means, there's only one thing left to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0430
rows.name: Destroy them. Put the old Neilnail in her coffin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0440
rows.name: [ST:undisp ]*gasp*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0450
rows.name:
As I'm sure you're aware from the last battle,
they're not likely to roll over and die for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0460
rows.name: Once again...would you lend me your strength?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0470
rows.name: ...Please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_JNK0480
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev093002_SEL0490
rows.name: Lend Neilnail your strength.

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0500
rows.name: Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0510
rows.name:
I was fully expecting you to turn me down, so...
honestly...I'm delighted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0520
rows.name: After all, I couldn't ask this of just anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0530
rows.name:
It's a risky assignment, but I'm more than
convinced we'll be able to pull this off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_JNK0540
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev093002_SEL0550
rows.name: Show reluctance about the whole idea.

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0560
rows.name:
Umm... I'd like to entreat you too.
Please give Lady Neil the help she requires.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0570
rows.name:
The way you rescued Rock and I from those ruffians,
I imagine you'll have no trouble prevailing in this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0580
rows.name: Celica...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0590
rows.name:
Really? Well, that's great! I can't imagine
a better person for the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0600
rows.name:
Lady Neil, let me accompany you too.
I promise I won't slow you down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0610
rows.name:
Thank you, Celica. With you at my side,
I'm all the more reassured.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0620
rows.name:
First off, we'll need to find your
predecessor's Skells, won't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0630
rows.name: According to the data I collected,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0640
rows.name:
they recently ambushed someone—
a BLADE who was exploring a cluster of ruins in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0650
rows.name:
If the Skells are meant to deter anyone
who explores too far into the ruins, then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0660
rows.name:
You're saying if we investigate those ruins ourselves,
they will come for us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0670
rows.name: Bingo. I think it's worth a try.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0680
rows.name:
For starters, why don't we try looking in
those ruins for info samples?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0690
rows.name: That said, we'll have to be snappy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0695
rows.name: We can't risk them claiming any more victims.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093002_MSG0700
rows.name: At once, Lady Neil![ST:wait ]
